name: df-mon1
body: |- wceq(cmn1, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), wa(wne(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cfv(cur, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ Monic1p =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(Base `(Poly1 ` s0))|(s1 ‚â†(0 `(Poly1 ` s0))‚àß((coe1 ` s1)`((deg1 ` s0)` s1))=(1r ` s0))})
comment: Define the set of monic univariate polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
